atg.cortex
Class CortexIntrospectorImpl

java.lang.Object
  atg.cortex.CortexIntrospectorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CortexIntrospector
public class CortexIntrospectorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CortexIntrospector

This class is an implementation of CortexIntrospector that uses the following rules to resolve classes to Cortex objects. The rules are based on those used by java.beans.Introspector.

  • If the cache internal to this implementation already has a mapping from that class to a Cortex object, that Cortex object is returned.
  • If the class implements CortexFactory, then a new instance of the class is created, and createCortex() is called to obtain the Cortex.
  • If a class exists with the name {classname}Cortex and is a subclass of Cortex, then an instance of that class constructed and returned. For example, if the class is "site.data.Person", then this will search for a class called "site.data.PersonCortex".

See Also:
Introspector

getCache

addToCache

protected void addToCache(java.lang.Class pClass,
                          Cortex pCortex)
Adds the specified mapping from class to Cortex, replacing any existing mapping for that class. Subclasses that implement their own methods for finding Cortex objects can use this to cache their results.

getCortex

public Cortex getCortex(java.lang.Class pClass)
Returns the Cortex associated with the given class.
